title: Experiential Language Education Design Based on Reflective Inquiry

context.additional_context: An integrated course combining experiential activities and reflective inquiry to enhance practical language skills for professionals

learning_goals: Learners will utilize 50 or more context-specific vocabulary items through experiential activities in real language-use situations.
Through weekly reflective journaling, learners will analyze their language-use experiences and propose three or more improvement strategies.

After two role-play and simulation activities, learners incorporate at least three peer feedback points, revise communication strategies, and apply them with â‰¥80% accuracy in real-life conversations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
